SEARCH
Module UsefulSchoolPortal
Package objects

Class Assignment

java.lang.Object
objects.Assignment
public class Assignment extends Object
The Assignment class is a representation of an assignment. It has important values such as grades (stored in a file), IDs, and more to ensure that it performs the functions of an assignment in the program.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Daniel Santillan

  • Constructor Details

    • Assignment

      public Assignment(String name, int points, int classID, int schoolID)
      This constructor builds a new assignment, as the ID is randomized. All other fields are set by the program parameters from the user. This is for an assignment that uses the points scoring method.
      Parameters:
      name - Given name
      points - Given points value
      classID - Given class ID
      schoolID - Given school ID

    • Assignment

      public Assignment(String name, String weightCategory, int classID, int schoolID)
      This constructor builds a new assignment, as the ID is randomized. All other fields are set by the program parameters from the user. This is for an assignment that uses weights.
      Parameters:
      name - Given name
      weightCategory - Given weight category
      classID - Given class ID
      schoolID - Given school ID

    • Assignment

      public Assignment(String name, int classID, int schoolID)
      This constructor builds a new assignment, as the ID is randomized. All other fields are set by the program paremeters from the user. This is for an assignment that uses a basic percents system.
      Parameters:
      name - Given name
      classID - Given class ID
      schoolID - Given school ID

    • Assignment

      public Assignment(String name, int points, int id, int classID, int schoolID)
      This constructor builds an existing assignment, as the ID along with the other fields are set by the program parameters from the user. This is for an assignment that uses a points system.
      Parameters:
      name - Given name
      points - Given points
      id - Given ID
      classID - Given class ID
      schoolID - Given school ID

    • Assignment

      public Assignment(String name, String weightCategory, int id, int classID, int schoolID)
      This constructor builds an existing assignment, as the ID along with the other fields are set by the program parameters from the user. This is for an assignment that uses weights.
      Parameters:

      classID - Given class ID

    • setGrades

      public boolean setGrades(ArrayList<Double> grades)
      The setGrades method sets the grades of the students in the assignment. It is also written in the file.
      Parameters:
      grades - The list of grades
      Returns:
      Whether or not everything was added properly

    • addStudentDisplacement

      public void addStudentDisplacement(int studentID)
      The addStudentDisplacement method adds a new student's student ID to the grades list file.
      Parameters:
      studentID - The student ID of the new student

    • removeStudentDisplacement

      public void removeStudentDisplacement(int index)
      The removeStudentDisplacement method removes a deleted student's info from the grades list file.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the student on the file

    • getIndividualStudentGrade

      The getIndividualStudentGrade method gets a student's individual grade from an assignment.

      Returns:
      The grade of the student
